unnormalised: Hey auto enthusiasts! Buckle up, because the Indian auto market is heating up with new vehicle launches!
normalised: Hey auto enthusiasts! Buckle up, because the Indian auto market is heating up with new vehicle launches!

unnormalised: First off, Dr. Reddy's Auto (no relation to the pharma giant, folks!) just unveiled their compact SUV, the "Bheem," promising mileage that'll make your wallet sing – think Delhi to Jaipur on one tank. Expected price? Around Rs. 8 Lakhs, ex-showroom.
normalised: First off, D R dot Reddy's Auto (no relation to the pharma giant, folks!) just unveiled their compact S U V, the "Bheem," promising mileage that'll make your wallet sing – think Delhi to Jaipur on one tank. Expected price? Around rupees eight lakhs, ex-showroom.

unnormalised: Then, Tata Motors dropped a teaser for their updated Nexon EV – rumors say it boasts a bigger battery and a seriously revamped infotainment system. Launch date: Just before Diwali, perfect for those festive road trips!
normalised: Then, Tata Motors dropped a teaser for their updated Nexon E V – rumors say it boasts a bigger battery and a seriously revamped infotainment system. Launch date: Just before Diwali, perfect for those festive road trips!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Mahindra is reportedly gearing up to launch a rugged, Thar-inspired pickup truck. Spy shots are all over the internet, and it looks like it's ready to conquer any terrain, from Ladakh to Kanyakumari.
normalised: Meanwhile, Mahindra is reportedly gearing up to launch a rugged, Thar-inspired pickup truck. Spy shots are all over the internet, and it looks like it's ready to conquer any terrain, from Ladakh to Kanyakumari.

unnormalised: Finally, a homegrown startup, "Desi Drives," showcased their electric rickshaw prototype at IIT Madras. They're claiming a revolutionary battery tech that triples the range and reduces charging time drastically. Manufacturing plant to be built in Chennai, covering 50,000 sq ft. Watch this space, folks! It's going to be a wild ride!
